external_games.name: World of Tanks Modern Armor - Frostbite Starter Pack

name: World of Tanks: Modern Armor - Frostbite Starter Pack
summary:
You'll have "snow" problem getting the most out of your battles this winter. Jump into the latest season of World of Tanks Modern Armor with the FREE Frostbite Starter Pack!

This cooler-than-cool DLC bundle is packed with Boosters and Premium Account time to help you earn more from every match.

Bundle includes:
• 3 Days of Premium Account
• (5) x2 Silver Boosters
• (5) x3 Vehicle XP Boosters
• (5) x4 Commander XP Boosters
